actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to provid emergency assistance to agricultural producers that have incurred losses during calendar year 2006 due to fires.

summary.text: Agriculture Fire Assistance Act of 2006 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to provide assistance: (1) to agricultural producers who incurred fire-caused losses in 2006 for livestock indemnity payments and feed assistance; (2) for the emergency conservation and watershed protection programs, with priority given to producers who incurred fire-caused losses in 2006; and (3) for environmental quality incentive payments to producers who incurred fire-caused losses in 2006.

titles.title: A bill to provid emergency assistance to agricultural producers that have incurred losses during calendar year 2006 due to fires.
